Marketing Assets

No matter what materials you're creating, there are many ways for you to leverage the power of the Visa brand. This section provides you access to various powerful resources for your marketing needs.

  • Advertising
  • Brand
  • Sponsorships

Advertising

Visa Brand Central

Brand Central provides a section on our Visa look tone and feel guidelines and marketing templates.

Brand Central is available to all Visa employees and registration is required for agency partners.

Partner Center

The Partner Center is an online file sharing mechanism for use between OMD and Visa. It houses all media planning, competitive, spending and point of view types of documents that are created and shared with Visa throughout the entire planning process. Note, this is an accessed-controlled site, so please contact Michael.Kost@omd.com if you cannot access the site.

Back to Top

Brand

Visa Brand Central

Brand Central provides Visa look tone and feel guidelines, assets (such as: logos, templates, imagery) along with brand positioning and strategy frameworks, naming and trademark standards.

Brand Central is available to all Visa employees and registration is required for agency partners.

Visa Product Brand Standards

VPBS is the official resource for card and logo specifications for Visa products and services. It includes requirements for card types and features, use of logos and names, manufacturing and personalization.

Product Brand Standards is available to Visa employees and registration is required for clients and card manufacturers.

Back to Top

Duplication and distribution of these assets for any other reason or to any non-Visa personnel may violate copyright laws and is strictly prohibited. Any site assets may not be used for external presentations of any kind, including client presentations or in a public forum of any kind, without the prior written permission of the Visa Legal Department.
